name: AWS Slideshow
author: AWSTheme

sections.description:
AWS Slideshow make and manage slideshow helping you make creative slideshow be very easy. With shortcode you can place slideshow anywhere in your site.

Features:

  • Workspace is easy for building slideshows
  • Many effects are adapted to your tasks
  • All effects is make by CSS3 supporting mordern browser
  • Video slide for mordern slideshow
  • Optimization for SEO and speed
  • Unlimited amount of images to be added to the slider

Video Guide:

Check official website for live demo
http://demo.awstheme.com/aws-slideshow

To report bugs or feature requests, please visiting AWS Slideshow support.
sections.installation:
Installing the awsslideshow plugin is very easy. Simply follow the steps below.

Method 1: Install Slideshow via the WordPress.org plugin directory ( recommended )

Method 2: Uploading the files to your server

  1. Extract the package to obtain the awsslideshow folder
  2. Upload awsslideshow to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How to create a slideshow?

  1. Click on plus icon on slides tabs
  2. On Elements tabs choose element you like

How to add effect for element?

Select element you want to add effect, on properties tabs choose effect you want

Could I align elements?

Yes, you can align elements by holding shift and select elements.
